page.title: 15Godmanchester's New Bridge
page.content:
{BLOWING UP THE OLD RAILWAY BRIDGE {TO BUILD THE NEW ONE. June 1985
They are building a new bridge over the east coast railway line as a part of the{electrification}scheme. It is bridge 140. The old bridge had 3 arches. They have put a Bailey bridge while they are building the new bridge. The workmen have to build the bridge so that the farmer can get from one field to another. The workmen think it will take 9 months to build. The old bridge has been{blown up.}The workmen had to have straw on top of the Porta-Cabins to protect them while the bridge was being blown up. The old bridge was made of blue engineering bricks and the new bridge is being made of concrete and steel.
